name: Cain's Travelers
flavorText: Deckard Cain spent the last twenty years of his life traveling the world in search of information needed to defeat the Lords of Hell.
flavorTextHtml: Deckard Cain spent the last twenty years of his life traveling the world in search of information needed to defeat the Lords of Hell.
setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 Attack Speed Increased by 8.0%    
 +50% Experience. (5.0% at level 70)(3) Set:     
 When a Greater Rift Keystone drops, there is a 25% chance for an extra one to drop. (Emanates)
